text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zai-org/Open-AutoGLM | 96% | stars now 18600 → est 31458 (range 31375-31541)
   https://github.com/zai-org/Open-AutoGLM
2) productdevbook/port-killer | 93% | stars now 2392 → est 6013 (range 5988-6038)
   https://github.com/productdevbook/port-killer
3) journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover | 92% | stars now 741 → est 3201 (range 3176-3226)
   https://github.com/journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover
4) eooce/Gla-deploy | 90% | stars now 1216 → est 2503 (range 2478-2528)
   https://github.com/eooce/Gla-deploy
5) agentskills/agentskills | 90% | stars now 2927 → est 7749 (range 7712-7786)
   https://github.com/agentskills/agentskills

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
